org.resthub.web.test.controller

Class AbstractControllerWebTest<T,ID extends Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.web.test.AbstractWebTest
      • org.resthub.web.test.controller.AbstractControllerWebTest<T,ID>

  • public abstract class AbstractControllerWebTest<T,ID extends Serializable>
extends AbstractWebTest
    Base class for your generic controller integration tests Run an embeded servlet container in order to test your controller
